Package data

Class Student

java.lang.Object
data.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Student>
public class Student extends Object implements Comparable<Student>
Class to implement the Student object. Holds a profile object, Major enum, and an integer. Contains methods to override inherited methods from the Java objects and comparable classes. Calculate the standing of a Student
Author:
Nikhil Agarwal, Hyeon Oh

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Student student)
      Override compareTo method from Java Comparable class. Syntax: student1.compareTo(student2)
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Student>
      Parameters:
      student - the object to be compared.
      Returns:

    • getStanding

      public String getStanding(int creditCompleted)
      Checks how many credits a student has completed and returns the standing of the student.
      Parameters:
      creditCompleted - number of credits student has completed.
      Returns:
      Freshman if creditsCompleted<30, Sophomore if 30<=creditsCompleted<60, Junior if 60<=creditsCompleted<90, Senior if creditsCompleted>=90

    • changeMajor

      public void changeMajor(Major newMajor)
      Changes Major of student to a particular newMajor.
      Parameters:
      newMajor - the major we want to set Major to.

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks to see if the student object is a valid student that can be added to our roster.
      Returns:
      true if the student is valid to add to the roster, false otherwise.

    • getCode_School

      private String getCode_School(Major major)
      Helper method to format output of the Major portion of our student object.
      Parameters:
      major - major to be formatted to string.
      Returns:
      String of formatted major. Ex: CS -> (01:198 CS SAS)
